solution_line_template: In the matrix, there are seven fewer noodles than pirates, meaning there are {num_pirates}-{fewer_noodles}=<<{num_pirates}-{fewer_noodles}={num_noodles}>>{num_noodles} noodles.
The number of noodles and pirates in the matrix is {num_noodles}+{num_pirates}=<<{num_noodles}+{num_pirates}={total_noodles_pirates}>>{total_noodles_pirates}
